__e: Fitz, it's been a long time since I met a woman that I really like, okay?
Because Fitz is who he is, and you can either be friends with someone or you cannot be friends with him, but you can't pick and choose the moments.

You had to spend that night at his house the other day. And we never had a chance to talk about it, because, well, all hell broke loose with Fitz and the shooting, so I was wondering, how is your father doing?
Mr. Fitz isn't here, and I don't want to be here by myself because... anyway, as soon as you get this message, please come to the school and pick me up immediately.
Fitz never told you that this man came to me?
Yeah, Fitz, you have no idea what Emma and I are.
Fitz said you wouldn't want to have dinner, but I said, of course you would. Of course.
Something Fitz said got me thinking.
You know that Jimmy Fitz only pulled a score with two other guys.
